channel.title: Alex Kiefer's Notebook
channel.description: Recent content on Alex Kiefer's Notebook

item.title: Quantum Computing Conference
item.description: Conference: Quantum Information for Mathematics, Economics, and Statistics This summer, I will be working at Argonne National Laboratory as part of the Science Undergraduate Laboratory Internship (SULI) program. As part of this program, I will be working under Dr. Martin Suchara, a scientist in the Mathematics and Computer Science division at Argonne National Laboratory and at the Pritzker School of Molecular Engineering at the University of Chicago. As part of this program, I will be working on further developing quantum network simulation software.

item.title: The Beginning
item.description: The Beginning This is the first of, hopefully, a number of posts on this website to track the things going on in my academic, professional, and personal life. My intent with this website it to serve and a means of improving my understanding of various technologies, algorithms, etc by writing about them, as well as my writing and research skills. I will aim to keep this blog semi-professional, as I want it to be something that doesn’t blacklist me from the industry, but still something that I enjoy writing.
